website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel spark guard with easy access sliding screen should last a long time.
pros: Hinged design allows for half the screen to slide up, granting easy access to fire
Stainless steel material is weatherproof and should prevent rust
cons: Much higher price than similar size screen
actually 29" wide as one half is shorter due to hinge design

customer_reviews.title: It's  rusting
customer_reviews.text: It's rusting. The screen is rusting. Stainless should not rust. I don't think it is stainless. I would not have bought it. If you don't mind rust it functions as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Kossum

customer_reviews.title: Made of low quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: The screen completely rusted through because it was made of low grade stainless steel. Highly recommend buying a cover due to the low grade stainless steel. Hopefully the manufacturer upgrades the stainless steel quality, because it should last a lot longer than a 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel is excellent against those elements and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we've been through a few others and they had either rusted or burnt through. However, stainless steel is excellent against those elements and so far so good. That being said, it's slightly small ( by an or fraction) because it's meant to sit on the top flat edge of a fire pit, which ours isn't--it's curved. The cover sinks in a bit, but definitely works to protect. This is my reason for a 4 versus 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ImeldaM

customer_reviews.title: Real experience
customer_reviews.text: Good stainless, shape damaged rivet broke that holds two halves together had to fix No competition on the market at the price so with little elbow grease still a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Fighting fraud

customer_reviews.title: Item is rusting.  Not stainless steel and described.
customer_reviews.text: Product is rusting and is supposed to be made of stainless steel (should not rust). Poor buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not 30 inches
customer_reviews.text: Good priduct, but it is 29.5 inches and not 30 inches, it falls inside the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: DON MICKEN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but great because it doesn't rust and holds up well at high temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Lt. Jim Flip  Ret.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find perfect size, and wanted one that was stainless
customer_reviews.text: High quality unit. Should last a lifetime. Only negative is it's not exact size, but couldn't downgrade, 'cause I knew that when I ordered it and it's only a little small. Couldn't find perfect size, and wanted one that was stainless. This is a quality piece. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and also lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra money I take in after use rust free very nice heavy duty tool as well would buy again
customer_reviews.author: John McDearmon

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Humid Climate
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 months in Florida where it has withstood the elements just fine. Looks like it was built to last. Wish they had a larger size as my firefit is 30" and the screen falls in at times.
customer_reviews.author: JS

product_meta.title: Good Directions 30" Large Stainless Steel Spark Screen
product_meta.description: Size:30 InchThe intricately woven Stainless Steel mesh spark screen offers an added layer of protection to any outdoor fire pit blaze!
feature_bullets: Intricately woven mesh made of polished Stainless Steel. Stainless steel is weather resistant for added longevity. Prevents sparks and embers from escaping.
Please measure your fire pit to confirm a 29-30 inch screen will fit securely.
Hinged spark screen allows easy access to the fire without the need to remove the screen and has convenient handle on top to lift the screen on and off.
Due to the hinged nature of the screen, the diameter is shorter one way than the other, which allows the shorter screen to easily rotate open inside the larger half of the screen.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
